About Lionel Messi’s Personal Life

Messi was born on 24 June 1987 in Argentina. His full name is Lionel Andres Messi. In childhood, Messi was diagnosed with a growth hormone deficiency, due to which his normal growth stopped at the age of 11. During this time, the football club Barcelona was very impressed with his football skills and agreed to pay his medical bills and the expenses of his entire family. Lionel Messi House and Cars

Lionel Messi owns two houses, one of them is in Argentina which he bought in the year 2009 and which cost him around US$2 million. The second house is in Spain and he also has several real estate properties in France and other countries. Lionel Messi has a huge collection of cars and he owns some of the best luxury cars in the world. The car brands owned by Lionel Messi include Mercedes, Ferrari, Bentley, etc.

One of the most luxurious cars he owns is the Ferrari F430 Spider. The F430 Spider is the convertible version based on the coupe. It is Ferrari’s 21st road-going convertible car. Apart from this, he also owns a Maserati GranTurismo S. It is a two-door, four-seat coupe manufactured by Italian car manufacturer Maserati.
